member.value: True, to include CLDR JSON data; otherwise, false.

A control that displays an interactive preview of a document generated from a report and allows the user to view, print, and export the report document in Blazor Server and standalone Blazor WebAssembly apps.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.ReportName

summary.para: Gets or sets a string that specifies the unique report name.

member.value: A string that identifies a report.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewer.SetParametersAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.ParameterView)

summary.para: This method is intended for internal use. You do not need to call it directly from your code.

member.param: The parameters supplied by the component’s parent in the render tree.
member.returns: A Task that completes when the DxDocumentViewer has finished updating and rendering itself.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesigner.AllowMDI

summary.para: Gets or sets whether a user can close all reports designed in the Report Designer and leave the designer empty, or a single report remains.

member.value: True to allow the user to close all reports; false if a single report remains.

summary.para: Exposes extension methods to configure reporting services within the application’s Startup class.

summary.para: Adds the DevExpress Blazor Reporting services to the collection.

member.param: A list of service descriptor objects that define services in an application.
member.returns: An updated list of service descriptor objects for subsequent use.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.StartupExtensions.UseDevExpressBlazorReporting(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)

summary.para: Registers the DevExpress Blazor Reporting middleware.
